General.Name: Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobiles, and axles and other auto parts in China. It offers pickup vehicles; mini buses; electric buses; special pickup vehicles, including sewer suction pickups, refrigerated pickups, blasting equipment transporter, police pickups, pickup cranes, and pickup wrecker; sanitation vehicles, such as self-loading garbage trucks, sewer flushing/suction vehicles, snow sweepers, and garbage compression trucks; cargo vehicles, including wingspan trailers, cargo tank containers, fuel transportation trailers, and cargo trailers; and modified vehicles, such as recreational vehicles, vending vans, washing/sweeper vehicles, and machine shop trucks, as well as types of axles. It also provides cargo warehousing services, import and export of goods and technology, heating services, and inspection and testing services. In addition, the company invests in real estate projects. The company offers its vehicles under the Huanghai brand and axles under the SG brand. Liaoning SG Automotive Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Dandong, China.
